62d61d4b-bb3b-4f4e-a7f3-b605220b6d19.description: For multi-cluster setups, filter metrics based on the K8S cluster
62d61d4b-bb3b-4f4e-a7f3-b605220b6d19.name: cluster
62d61d4b-bb3b-4f4e-a7f3-b605220b6d19.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT JSONExtractString(labels, 'cluster') AS cluster
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE cluster != ''

b46440da-81d7-46f2-aa2b-928033169397.description: Filter metrics based on the Kubernetes namespace where Istio is deployed
b46440da-81d7-46f2-aa2b-928033169397.name: namespace
b46440da-81d7-46f2-aa2b-928033169397.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_namespace_name') AS namespace
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE namespace != ''

ed02d037-2cd3-4a16-ad7f-303a2a0d3449.name: deployment.environment
ed02d037-2cd3-4a16-ad7f-303a2a0d3449.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment_environment') AS environment
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE environment IN ('Production', 'Staging')

fdcbc75b-7c17-41cf-aed9-4bfca643281e.description: Select specific services within the mesh to filter metrics
fdcbc75b-7c17-41cf-aed9-4bfca643281e.name: service.name
fdcbc75b-7c17-41cf-aed9-4bfca643281e.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT JSONExtractString(labels, 'service_istio_io_canonical_name') AS service
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE service != ''

widgets.description: Displays the total number of requests processed by the service mesh.
widgets.title: Total Requests

widgets.description: Shows the rate of incoming and outgoing requests per second.
widgets.title: Request Rate

widgets.description: Illustrates the average latency of requests within the mesh.
widgets.title: Average Latency

widgets.description: Displays the percentage of failed requests.
widgets.title: Error Rate

widgets.description: Shows the distribution of requests across different services and versions
widgets.title: Request Distribution

widgets.description: Shows the distribution of requests across different services and versions.
widgets.title: Request Distribution

widgets.description: Monitors load balancing effectiveness, including request distribution fairness.
widgets.title: Load Balancing Efficiency

widgets.description: Tracks the number of circuit breaker events triggered, if implemented.
widgets.title: Circuit Breaker Events

widgets.description: Shows the number of requests processed per unit of time, indicating service capacity.
widgets.title: Throughput

widgets.description: Illustrates the response times for services within the mesh.
widgets.title: Service Response Times

widgets.description: Displays the rate of HTTP errors (e.g., 4xx, 5xx) across services.
widgets.title: HTTP Error Rates

widgets.description: Displays the rate of HTTP errors (e.g., 4xx, 5xx) across services.
widgets.title: HTTP Error Rates

widgets.description: Displays the rate of HTTP errors (e.g., 4xx, 5xx) across services.
widgets.title: HTTP Error Rates

widgets.description: Displays CPU usage for Istio control plane
widgets.title: CPU Usage

widgets.description: Shows memory consumption of Istio components.
widgets.title: Memory Usage

widgets.description: Displays the number of configuration syncs performed by Pilot
widgets.title: Pilot Configuration Syncs

widgets.description: Displays key metrics from Envoy proxies, such as active connections and request rates.
widgets.title: Envoy Proxy Metrics

widgets.description: Shows the volume of inbound traffic handled by data plane proxies.
widgets.title: Inbound Traffic
